title: Cloud Infrastructure Optimization
impact: Currently, the server response time is high during peak hours. We need support to optimize the database queries and implement a caching mechanism (Redis) to reduce load and improve user experience by 40%.

title: Backend API Performance Optimization Required
impact:
Our current API response time exceeds 2 seconds for complex database queries, which is affecting user experience significantly. We need expert assistance to optimize our backend infrastructure, implement caching strategies, and refactor slow database queries. 

Expected outcomes:
- Reduce API response time to under 500ms
- Implement Redis caching for frequently accessed data
- Optimize database indexes and queries
- Improve overall system scalability

This will impact 5000+ daily active users and reduce server costs by approximately 40%.

title: Multi-language Voice Interface for Rural Users
impact:
We need to develop a comprehensive multi-language support system with voice interface capabilities to serve rural communities. The system should support:

Technical Requirements:
- Bengali, Hindi, and 5 regional languages (Sylheti, Chittagonian, Rangpuri, Chakma, Marma)
- Voice-to-text case filing system
- AI-powered legal document translation
- Offline capability for areas with poor connectivity
- Simple, literacy-independent user interface

Expected Impact:
- Enable 200,000+ rural citizens to access legal aid services
- Remove literacy barriers for legal assistance
- Reduce case filing time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
- Increase legal aid accessibility by 300%

This will revolutionize access to justice for marginalized communities.

title: Advanced Facial Recognition Algorithm Development
impact:
Development of next-generation facial recognition algorithms optimized for challenging conditions. Research focus areas:

Technical Scope:
- Deep learning models for low-light facial recognition
- Multi-angle face detection and verification
- Real-time processing optimization (sub-second response)
- Anti-spoofing mechanisms (liveness detection)
- Edge computing deployment for offline verification

Performance Targets:
- 99.8% accuracy in low-light conditions
- Process 1M+ verifications daily
- Sub-second response time per verification
- 99.9% anti-spoofing accuracy

Applications:
- National security and border control
- Secure digital identity verification
- Automated attendance systems
- Access control for sensitive facilities

This research will position Bangladesh as a leader in biometric technology.

title: Enterprise Digital Transformation Strategy Consultancy
impact:
We require comprehensive digital transformation consultancy for government agencies. The engagement should cover:

Scope of Work:
- Current state assessment and gap analysis
- Cloud migration strategy (on-premise to hybrid cloud)
- Cybersecurity framework implementation (ISO 27001)
- Digital workflow automation
- Employee training and change management
- Technology vendor evaluation and selection

Deliverables:
- 5-year digital transformation roadmap
- Cloud migration plan with cost-benefit analysis
- Cybersecurity policy and implementation guide
- Training curriculum for 500+ employees
- KPI dashboard for tracking progress

Expected Impact:
- Modernize operations for 15+ government departments
- Serve 10M+ citizens with improved digital services
- Reduce operational costs by 25%
- Improve service delivery time by 60%
- Expected ROI of 300% within 3 years

This will be a flagship project for government digitalization.

title: Cross-Platform Mobile App for Field Data Collection
impact:
Development of offline-capable mobile application for field workers to collect and sync data in remote areas.

Technical Requirements:
- Cross-platform (iOS & Android) using React Native
- Offline-first architecture with automatic sync
- GPS tracking and location tagging
- Photo documentation with compression
- Digital signature capture
- Encrypted local storage
- Role-based access control

Features:
- Form builder for custom data collection
- Real-time validation and error checking
- Automatic sync when internet available
- Progress tracking and reporting
- Multi-user collaboration
